*Feedback*? A *wind* through the bamboo, *yes*? Each reed *singing* a *different song*...

But *I*... *I* say *listen*! *Listen* to the *truth* in the *wind*!

And the *grade*... *ah*, the *number*... a *shadow* on the page! *Fleeting*! *Gone* with the *tomorrow*!

But the *story*? *that*... that is *etched* on the *soul*!

*Document it*, they say... *every twitch, every gasp of the... *dragonfly*!

You see? *truth*! The *dragonfly* knows not which *word* I weave... knows only the *wind*!

And *we*, the *scribes*, we *dance* with the wind! *Yes*?!

*Tap, tap, tap*... the *pattern*... *always
